dt: {bc}a usually rigid supportive or protective structure or framework of an organism
{bc}the bony or more or less cartilaginous framework supporting the soft tissues and protecting the internal organs of a vertebrate
{bc}something reduced to its minimum form or essential parts
{bc}the straight or branched chain or ring of atoms that forms the basic structure of an organic molecule
{bc}something shameful and kept secret (as in a family)
often used in the phrase {it}skeleton in the closet{/it}
{bc}a small sled that is ridden in a prone position and used especially in competition

art.capt: skeleton 1:{it}1{/it} skull, {it}2{/it} clavicle, {it}3{/it} scapula, {it}4{/it} sternum, {it}5{/it} humerus, {it}6{/it} pelvis, {it}7{/it} carpus, {it}8{/it} metacarpal bones, {it}9{/it} phalanges (fingers), {it}10{/it} tibia, {it}11{/it} tarsus, {it}12{/it} metatarsal bones, {it}13{/it} phalanges (toes), {it}14{/it} fibula, {it}15{/it} patella, {it}16{/it} femur, {it}17{/it} ulna, {it}18{/it} radius, {it}19{/it} spinal column, {it}20{/it} rib, {it}21{/it} orbit

et: New Latin, from Greek, neuter of {it}skeletos{/it} dried up; akin to Greek {it}skellein{/it} to dry up, {it}sklēros{/it} hard and perhaps to Old English {it}sceald{/it} shallow
shortdef: a usually rigid supportive or protective structure or framework of an organism; especially : the bony or more or less cartilaginous framework supporting the soft tissues and protecting the internal organs of a vertebrate
something reduced to its minimum form or essential parts

dt: {bc}something bad or embarrassing that happened in someone's past and that is kept secret

dt.t: He asked if she had any {it}skeletons in her closet{/it} that might affect her political campaign.

shortdef: something bad or embarrassing that happened in someone's past and that is kept secret

dt: {bc}something bad or embarrassing that happened in someone's past and that is kept secret

dt.t: He asked if she had any {it}skeletons in her cupboard{/it} that might affect her political campaign.

shortdef: something bad or embarrassing that happened in someone's past and that is kept secret

dt: {bc}the skeleton of the trunk and head

shortdef: the skeleton of the trunk and head
